Package game

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
game.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
Beginning of the GameModel class. Responsible for logic/state of the game and its components.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int
    gridSize
    Int variable to hold the grid size, 5x5 by default
    protected boolean
    markMode
    Boolean for the mark mode, false by default
    protected boolean
    receivedFromServer
    Boolean for if the client received from the server

    • totalValidTiles

      protected void totalValidTiles()
      Finds the number of valid tiles by iterating through the rows and counting the 1's

    • writeDesignPattern

      protected String writeDesignPattern()
      Copies the designBoard row by row and returns the final concatenated string. (designMode)
      Returns:
      String containing the row data of 0's and 1's

    • writePattern

      protected String writePattern()
      Copies the play board row by row and returns the final concatenated string. (play mode)
      Returns:
      String containing the row data of 0's and 1's

    • sendGameToServer

      protected String sendGameToServer()
      Sends the board configuration to the server in one line separated each row using commas.
      Returns:
      - String containing the gridsize and the board configuration

    • sendDesignPatternToServer

      protected String sendDesignPatternToServer()
      Sends the board configuration of the design mode in one line, separated each row by a comma.
      Returns:
      - String containing the gridsize and the board configuration

    • sendDataToServer

      protected String sendDataToServer()
      Sends the game data to the server. Server data contains the username, user's best time, and user's best score.
      Returns:
      - String containing the username, best time and best score.

      Reads a given file, and gathers necessary info to update the board.
      Parameters:
      fileReader - Scanner used to read the file.

    • generateRows

      protected String[] generateRows(int maxPossible, boolean useDefault)
      Generates the rows given maxPossible and boolean useDefault.
      Parameters:
      maxPossible - maximum possible int that can be generated based on gridSize.
      useDefault - True when using default values, false when random numbers are to be generated.
      Returns:
      row with the generated values.

    • generateCols

      protected String[] generateCols()
      Generate columns based on the rows
      Returns:
      Return generated column.

      Parameters:

    • updateRow

      String updateRow(int i, int j)
      Updates the row labels when change is detected on the board in design mode.
      Parameters:
      i - index i, accesses rows.
      j - index j, accesses items in rows.
      Returns:
      returned the string containing updated tile numbers.

    • updateCol

      String updateCol(int i, int j)
      Updates the col labels when change is detected on the board in design mode.
      Parameters:
      i - index i, accesses rows.
      j - index j, accesses items in rows.
      Returns:
      returned the string containing updated tile numbers.

    • updateDesignBoard

      Updates the design board by setting selected tiles as 1
      Parameters:
      i - Index i of the array (row)
      j - Index j of the row.
